mapper.select: SELECT i.*, m.member_id FROM tb_goods_inquiry i INNER JOIN tb_member m ON i.member_no=m.member_no WHERE goods_no=#{goods_no} ORDER BY i.inquiry_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_goods_inquiry (inquiry_type, title, content, inquiry_date, is_reply, goods_no, member_no,is_secret) VALUES (#{inquiry_type}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, #{goods_no}, #{member_no}, #{is_serect})
